00040 void cleanup(int ret)
00041 {
00042 #ifdef MPI
00043   int task=TASKFIN;
00044   BroadcastTask(&task);
00045 
00046   MPI_Finalize();
00047 #endif
00048 
00049   exit(ret);
00050 }

00052 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00053 {
00054   createinfo(argc, argv);
00055 
00056 #ifdef MPI
00057   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00058   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00059   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00060 
00061   fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00062 
00063   if (mpirank != 0) {
00064     FormfactorSlave();
00065 
00066     MPI_Finalize();
00067   } else {
00068 #endif
00069 
00070   // enough arguments ?
00071 
00072   if (argc < 3) {
00073     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA NUCSFILE\n"
00074             "\n     -q QMAX         calculate to max momentum"
00075             "\n     -n NPOINTS      number of points"
00076             "\n     -p NALPHA-NBETA number of angles"
00077             "\n     -l MULTIPOLE    select multipole transition"
00078             "\n     -r              recoil\n",

00081   }

00083   int npoints = 50+1;
00084   int nalpha = 5;
00085   int ncosb = 4;
00086   double qmax = 5.0;
00087   int recoil = 0;
00088   int l = 0;
00089

00093 
00094   char c;
00095   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "rq:n:p:l:")) != -1)
00096     switch (c) {
00097     case 'r':
00098       recoil = 1;
00099       break;
00100     case 'q':
00101       qmax = atof(optarg);
00102       break;
00103     case 'n':
00104       npoints = atoi(optarg);
00105       break;
00106     case 'p':
00107       projparas = optarg;
00108       char* ang = strtok(projparas, "-");
00109       nalpha = atoi(ang);
00110       ang = strtok(NULL, "-");
00111       ncosb = atoi(ang);
00112       break;
00113     case 'l':
00114       l = atoi(optarg);
00115       break;

00119   char* nucsfile = argv[optind+1];
00120 
00121   char* mbfile[MAXSTATES];
00122   int n;
00123 
00124   if (readstringsfromfile(nucsfile, &n, mbfile))
00125     cleanup(-1);
00126 
00127   SlaterDet Q[n];
00128   Symmetry S[n];
00129 
00130   int i;
00131   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00132     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile[i], &S[i]);
00133     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], mbfile[i]))
00134       cleanup(-1);
00135   }
00136 
00137 
00138   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00139   int odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00140 
00141   // Projection parameters
00142   Projection P;

00144

00146   FormfactorPara FfP = {

00161 #endif

00170 
00171   void* ffactorme[NMULTIPOLES];

00177 
00178   int a,b;
00179 
00180   // read or calculate matrix elements
00181 
00182   for (b=0; b<n; b++)

00186                                     &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[a], S[b],
00187                                     ffactorme[i])) {

00193                           S[a], S[b], ffactorme[i]);
00194 #endif
